name: Paragon Infinite (itch)
description:
Now available on Ouya! Download Paragon Infinite Ouya.apk below!

In Paragon Infinite, you ride up and down magnetic rails and click, tap the screen, or press Space Bar to jump off. Time your jumps to make it through the obstacles, and try to collect all the treasures for bonus points! Don't hesitate or you'll risk exploding on the spikes!

  • Features infinite gameplay!
  • 4 game modes!
  • 4 graphical skins!
  • A wicked electro-industrial soundtrack!*

"[Paragon Infinite] is something that you shouldn't let bounce past you." - Super Game Droid

Want more Paragon action? Check out Paragon for PC at J.mp/paragongame!

Paragon Infinite was originally created for Flappy Jam. The Jam version can still be viewed and downloaded for free here: Paragon Infinite (Flappy Jam Version)

*Original Soundtrack (for both Paragon and Paragon Infinite) by Ex Machinae
